title: Adverse News for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC
adversity: Various regulatory challenges and fines due to compliance issues.
reasoning: Significant settlements and fines indicate serious regulatory concerns.
news:
1. [J.P. Morgan Fined $3M for Misreporting 77 Billion Shares - Yahoo Finance](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/j-p-morgan-fined-3m-110917606.html) - FINRA Slaps J.P. Morgan with $3M Fine Over Short Interest Errors. 
2. [J.P. Morgan to Pay $150M to Settle Slew of SEC Charges - Wealth Management](https://www.wealthmanagement.com/regulation-compliance/j-p-morgan-to-pay-150m-to-settle-slew-of-sec-charges) - J.P. Morgan will pay more than $150 million to settle a myriad of SEC charges. 
3. [JP Morgan to Pay $151 Million Over Major Disclosure Failures - StockLaw](https://www.stocklaw.com/securities-fraud-blog/2024/december/jp-morgan-to-pay-151-million-over-major-disclosu/) - JP Morgan agreed to pay $151 million to settle SEC charges alleging misleading disclosures. 
4. [JP Morgan affiliates to pay $151M to resolve SEC enforcement actions - Nasdaq](https://www.nasdaq.com/articles/jp-morgan-affiliates-pay-151m-resolve-sec-enforcement-actions) - The SEC charged J.P. Morgan Securities and J.P. Morgan Investment Management in five separate enforcement actions. 
5. [CFTC Orders J.P. Morgan to Pay $200m for Supervision Errors - Markets Media](https://www.marketsmedia.com/cftc-orders-j-p-morgan-to-pay-200m-for-supervision-failures/) - The CFTC issued an order against J.P. Morgan Securities for failing diligently to supervise its business.
